FCODE, FNAME, FSTATE, BLEND_TYPE, STORAGE_TYPE, OUTGOING_TYPE, MAT_CODE, ACTUAL_AMOUNT, STOCK_UNIT, STOCK_TOTAL_AMOUNT, STOCK_QTY_H, STOCK_QTY_L, WORKCENTER_CODE, FDES, STORAGE_UNIT_ID, STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID
mapper.update:
update
set FCODE = #{FCODE}, FNAME = #{FNAME}, FSTATE = #{FSTATE}, BLEND_TYPE = #{BLEND_TYPE}, STORAGE_TYPE = #{STORAGE_TYPE}, OUTGOING_TYPE = #{OUTGOING_TYPE}, MAT_CODE = #{MAT_CODE}, ACTUAL_AMOUNT = #{ACTUAL_AMOUNT}, STOCK_UNIT = #{STOCK_UNIT}, STOCK_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{STOCK_TOTAL_AMOUNT}, STOCK_QTY_H = #{STOCK_QTY_H}, STOCK_QTY_L = #{STOCK_QTY_L}, WORKCENTER_CODE = #{WORKCENTER_CODE}, FDES = #{FDES}, STORAGE_UNIT_ID = STORAGE_UNIT_ID where STORAGE_UNIT_ID = #{STORAGE_UNIT_ID}
mapper.select: select ,f1.MAT_NAME,f2.FNAME FCLASS_NAME,f3.FNAME WORKCENTER_NAME from f left join MBASE_MAT_BASIC f1 on f.MAT_CODE=f1.MAT_BASIC_ID left join MPOT_STORAGE_UNITCLASS f2 on f.STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID=f2.STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID left join MDM_WC_WORKCENTER f3 on f.WORKCENTER_CODE=f3.WC_WORKCENTER_ID where f.STORAGE_UNIT_ID = #{STORAGE_UNIT_ID}

select ,f1.MAT_NAME,f2.FNAME FCLASS_NAME from f left join MBASE_MAT_BASIC f1 on f.MAT_CODE=f1.MAT_BASIC_ID left join MPOT_STORAGE_UNITCLASS f2 on f.STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID=f2.STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID where 1=1
and ( f1.MAT_NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.MAT_NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.MAT_ALIAS LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.MAT_BRAND LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.MAT_FULL_NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f2.FNAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FCODE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FNAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
and ( f.BLEND_TYPE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.BLENDTYPE}+'%' )
and ( f.FSTATE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.FSTATE}+'%' )
and ( f.STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID LIKE '%'+ #{pd.STORAGEUNITCLASS}+'%' )
and ( f.WORKCENTER_CODE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.WORKCENTER}+'%' )
select STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID value, FNAME text from MPOT_STORAGE_UNITCLASS f order by FCODE
select WC_WORKCENTER_ID value, FNAME text from MDM_WC_WORKCENTER f order by FCODE

select top 10 MAT_BASIC_ID value, MAT_CODE text from MBASE_MAT_BASIC f where 1=1
and ( MAT_CODE LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' or MAT_NAME LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' or MAT_ALIAS LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' or MAT_FULL_NAME LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' or MAT_SPECS LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' )
order by MAT_BASIC_ID

select ,isnull(FNAME,'无名称')+'/'+isnull(FCODE,'无编号') FSelectOption from f
and ( f.FNAME LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FCODE LIKE '%'+ #{KEYWORDS}+'%' )
order by f.FCODE
SELECT COUNT(*) NUM FROM MPOT_STORAGE_UNIT f WHERE f.FCODE=#{FCODE}

select top 1 ,f1.MAT_NAME,f2.FNAME FCLASS_NAME,f3.FNAME WORKCENTER_NAME from f left join MBASE_MAT_BASIC f1 on f.MAT_CODE=f1.MAT_BASIC_ID left join MPOT_STORAGE_UNITCLASS f2 on f.STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID=f2.STORAGE_UNITCLASS_ID left join MDM_WC_WORKCENTER f3 on f.WORKCENTER_CODE=f3.WC_WORKCENTER_ID where f.FCODE=#{FCODE}
